sources.title: The Devils Messenger (1961)
sources.description: The Devil's Messenger is a 1961 anthology horror film directed by Herbert L. Strock. It combines three episodes from the 1959 Swedish television series 13 Demon Street, which was never aired in the USA. The film features new scenes with notable actor Lon Chaney Jr., who plays the role of Satan.Â  The film features a series of stories, including: A 50,000-year-old woman found frozen in ice. A man's death foretold through dreams. Satan's plan to destroy Earth with atomic weapons.
